pkgmetadata.longdescription: Implementation of ELM (Extreme Learning Machine ) algorithm for SLFN ( Single Hidden Layer Feedforward Neural Networks ) // Training and predict functions for SLFN ( Single Hidden-layer Feedforward Neural Networks ) using the ELM algorithm. ELM algorithm differs from the traditional gradient-based algorithms for very short training times ( it doesn't need any iterative tuning, this makes learning time very fast ) and there is no need to set any other parameters like learning rate, momentum, epochs, etc.
